trans-unit.source: Represents an object that arranges contextual tab groups in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa um objeto que organiza os grupos de guia contextual em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The size that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> needs to position its child elements.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> precisa para posicionar seus elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: Positions and sizes the child elements in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Posiciona e dimensiona os elementos filho neste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The actual size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho real do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The maximum size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho máximo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Measures the child elements in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> in preparation of arranging them during the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> pass.
trans-unit.target: Mede os elementos filho neste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> em preparação para organizá-los durante a passagem de <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" />.

trans-unit.source: The desired size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho desejado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor antigo da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" />.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" />.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost" /> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Draws the content of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> object during the render pass of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o conteúdo de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> durante a fase de renderização de um elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> à qual este controle pertence.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> que este controle pertence.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão registrado é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o que pode influenciar o valor, consulte [Precedência do valor da propriedade de dependência](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

trans-unit.source: This property is set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control and is inherited by the child controls.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é definida no pai <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> controlar e é herdada por controles filho.

trans-unit.source: It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
trans-unit.target: Ele é usado para acessar pincéis de estilo visual definidos no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> classe.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel.Ribbon" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonContextualTabGroupsPanel.Ribbon" />.
